description: Edge capacity maturity model for investment asset governance. Defines the transition path from initial data state through optimised lineage-controlled governance. Each level gates the next migration phase.

maturityLevels.label: Initial
maturityLevels.description: Ad-hoc processes. No structured lineage. Baseline capture only.

maturityLevels.label: Developing
maturityLevels.description: Repeatable processes. Basic lineage established. Migration path defined.

maturityLevels.label: Defined
maturityLevels.description: Standardised processes. Control imperatives enforced. Snapshot capability enabled.

maturityLevels.label: Managed
maturityLevels.description: Measured and controlled. Target metrics tracked. Edge cap limits enforced.

maturityLevels.label: Optimizing
maturityLevels.description: Continuous improvement. Full lineage. Automated back-snap on regression.
